## Source: ossf-package-analysis (60143053a50a131463b344fc0e64c7f5601ae6c70bfbf832bef293d4ba56b2af)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'security-alert-watcher' @ 0.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
